reviews.review: kaçak alın bence çünkü satın aldığınızda oyunu bitirince bi anlamı kalmıcak kütüpanenizde öyle durcak

While it doesn't have the retro charm of the original, it has beautiful graphics, fun gameplay, and an interesting story that expands upon the last game very well. I play on mac, so there are a few bugs with the cursor appearing for no reason, but that's probably just me.

Плюсы: 
 - Графон. Для своего времени - это прям прогресс. 
 - Физика. Всё-таки движок Source делает своё дело
 - Взаимодействие с окружением. Я имею в виду, что необязательно убивать врагов из оружия, которое вам даёт игра. Можно взять разбросанные рядом вещи, кидать ими во врагов. Да, это не так эффективно, но факт того, что так тоже можно, радует.
 - Локализация. Добротная озвучка персонажей.
 - В некоторых местах придётся подумать. И это радует. Люблю "умные" игры :)
 - Разнообразие локаций. Тут вам и канализации, и ж/д станция, и улицы Сити-17, и стрёмная деревня с зомбаками, и пляжи, и лаборатории. 
 - Разнообразие геймплея. Помимо обычного стреляния игра предлагает вам покататься на некоторых видах транспорта. Довольно драйвово и эпично.
 - Саунд. Крутое музыкальное сопровождение.
Минусы:
 - Сюжет. Мне не очень понравился. Обыкновенный, ничем особо не примечательный.  В начале игры уже можно предсказать, что будет в конце.
 - Некоторые персонажи сделаны глупо. Например главный злодей. Дядька не может дать отпор девушке, ну камон, я в это не верю ( в конце игры). Аликс немного раздражает своими странными диалогами. Мне больше всех понравились Барни и Кляйнер - самые живые персы, как по мне. 
 - Игра довольно коротка. Мне кажется, можно было её сделать и побольше
 - В своё время, проходя первую Халфу, она зашла мне больше, чем вторая часть. Та игра была сложнее, интереснее. Эта игра довольно лёгкая. 
Отличный шутер, ставлю ему 8/10, если хотите убить вечерок-другой, советую пройти это. К тому же легендарная игра

As good as the story and gameplay are, there are quite a few times that the game has, for one reason or another, pissed me off.
Light spoilers beyond this point to explain my issues.
These giant bugs that the player befriends get in the way quite a bit; especially when grenades are thrown into the mix, whether they be mine and I screwed up throwing them or they be the enemy's, I find it frustrating when I've got less than five seconds to kill three to four bug monsters in the doorway behind me that take more than five seconds to kill, total. I am also unaware of how to get them to stop following me.
Another time is when I encounter electrified water (for the first time?) and I put a wooden thing down and I get electrocuted anyway.
There's various other frustrations like I think that certain parts of levels going on for too long, but it's a fucking great game overall, I just made this to moan about some of my issues.
TL;DR: It's worth buying, get it if you haven't before.

犹记当年游戏刚出的时候，和朋友一起惊叹于画面与划时代物理引擎的强大，但想不起为什么没有通关？
整部游戏除了汽艇关卡感觉稍长了点找路容易晕人外，其他各方面都是完美的，连中文配音都非常用心，尤其感叹其物理引擎牛逼到现在都不过时，直到被自己的Alyx超越，真是每一作都堪称传奇游戏！

Where's Half Life 3??????

It blows me away just the sheer amount of love, passion, and dedication that went into the creation of this excellent title. To this day, I have not played one that even comes close to looking or feeling as good as Half-Life 2 does on a PC. Hell, I played it originally on a crappy Mac Book and it still functioned and looked great. It's incredible that Valve's Source Engine can support realistic and accurate water reflections where as most modern games seem to not even try.  

In summary, multiple facets of this game elevate it to, as most individuals who have played this game and spoken to me about it would say, "god-tier" status. The story is dark and engrossing, with characters who, I'm not naming any specifically, make no sense, yet carry a lot of weight within the universe and its surrounding lore. The shooting is, well, it's shooting, and it's best done with a mouse, not an Xbox controller, considering how frenetic the combat can and will become most of the time. The graphics, like I mentioned earlier, are incredible, considering how long ago the game came out. If you tell me the facial animations on Alyx's face when you first met her didn't blow you away, you're just outright lying. The puzzles, like in most Valve games, involve an interesting physics engine that can do some pretty wacky things. Sometimes it seems practical, and sometimes trying, as in your patience. Start putting this in a bowl, mix the heck out of it, and what do you get? A game that was for the fans, not just for the money. What happened to these kinds of titles? Seriously!

Now, I'm not a Valve fanboy who scours the internet for any trace of what might be a leak of Half-Life 3, but I can honestly say, I'd love to see what they'll do next. To be honest, I think Half-Life: Alyx might be the reason 3 never actually came out. They had a vision of VR, they went for it, and that's what came of it. Once I've had a chance to play it, meaning, when I manage to get my hands on a decent headset, I'll be sure to play it and review it.

Conclusion....buy HL2, it's fantastic and you will love pretty much every minute of it!

Half-Life 2 reminds me of a time when story-based games were the norm. By looking at my play time, you may think that I replayed this game once, maybe even twice. Yet, I only played it once. I still can't belive I got that much time out of this game. I am so used to singleplayer games to be over in 8-10 hours and then nugging me over to the multieplayer with some form of RNG lootboxes. I got the game in the Half-life complete bundle on sale for $8, which was well worth it. This game is a must have for any Steam uses, like the SNES with Super Mario World, and the Switch with Breath of the Wild. However, that water puzzle in the sewers of City 17 was horrible, just awful.
